statements: UPDATE spare_parts SET quantity = 5, price = 100.00 WHERE part_id = 1;
UPDATE spare_parts SET price = 80.50, quantity = 3 WHERE part_id = 2;
UPDATE spare_parts SET quantity = quantity + 5, price = 20.50 WHERE part_id = 101
UPDATE spare_parts SET price = price * 1.1, quantity = quantity - 3 WHERE part_name = 'Engine Oil'
UPDATE spare_parts SET quantity = 10, vehicle_type = 'SUV' WHERE part_id = 101;
UPDATE maintenance_tools SET stock_quantity = 5, description = 'Essential tool for maintenance' WHERE tool_id = 201;
UPDATE spare_parts SET quantity = 10, part_name = 'Spark Plug' WHERE part_id = 101;
UPDATE maintenance_tools SET description = 'High-quality wrench for maintenance tasks', stock_quantity = 50 WHERE tool_id = 201;
UPDATE spare_parts SET quantity = 100 WHERE part_id = 1;
UPDATE tools SET supplier = 'ABC Company' WHERE tool_id = 5;
UPDATE spare_parts SET quantity = quantity + 10, supplier = 'New Supplier' WHERE part_id = 100;
UPDATE materials SET supplier = 'Supplier XYZ', quantity = quantity - 5 WHERE material_name = 'Steel';
UPDATE Spare_Parts SET part_quantity = 100 WHERE part_id = 1;
UPDATE Vehicles SET maintenance_cost = 500.75, maintenance_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
UPDATE Spare_Parts SET part_quantity = 20, part_location = 'Warehouse A' WHERE part_id = 1;
UPDATE Vehicles SET maintenance_cost = 2500.55, vehicle_type = 'Truck' WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
UPDATE Vehicle SET manufacturer = 'Ford' WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
UPDATE Tool SET available = TRUE WHERE tool_id = 3;
UPDATE Vehicle SET manufacturer = 'Toyota', year = 2020 WHERE vehicle_id = 100
UPDATE SparePart SET quantity = 50, part_type = 'Engine' WHERE part_id = 200
